greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows in which row n lists n terms, starting with n, such that the difference between successive terms is equal to n^4 - 1 = A123865(n).
comment: See also the triangles of A162622 and A162624.
formula: Row sums: n*(n^5 - n^4 + n + 1)/2. - _R. J. Mathar_, Jul 20 2009
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Jul 12 2009
ext: More terms from _R. J. Mathar_, Sep 27 2009
